Name: The Survival of Sarah Rose
About the game: The Survival of Sarah Rose The Survival of Sarah Rose is an epic-fantasy erotic visual novel, following the life of the eldest daughter of the royal Rose family. When tragedy strikes, Sarah finds her once safe and stable life thrown into chaos. Playing as Sarah, you must make the decisions that will keep her safe in a world where danger is everywhere. TSSR features both an impactful choice system that sees radically different storylines depending on player choices, as well as featuring a meta-story that rewards players exploring every available path. Will Sarah fall deeper into despair or will she survive the many challenges ahead? You decide.
